title: Champion Mastery seen by Enemy?
body:
I'm really confused about champion mastery, i know that you cant see the enemy team's lvl 4/5 banner in the loading screen, and i also know that you cant see the 'Command 6' custom emote of enemy champions, so how come you can see their lvl 4/5 banner in the kill/death notifications?

i do see both sides of the argument, 
people have put in hard work and earned their banners and emotes so they should be able to be seen by both teams 
but also they could cause unwanted lane camping or psyching out the enemy cos you're lvl 5 and they could be first time with their champ or something

i personally believe the enemy team should be able to see the custom emote thing because thats optional to use and if you dont want to be camped then dont use it, but if you want to be a showoff after you get a fancy tripple or something then you can.

but i dont understand why the enemy CANT see that optional one, but CAN see the banner that isn't optional? it makes no sense 

can someone explain?

picture included of an enemy champ with the lvl 4 mastery banner.

replies.body: Probably coz u can use the ctrl-6 to distract people in lane?

I'd reverse the two too. Frankly, even just having the emote visible would be enough.
Getting a triple kill gets you enough attention already anyways.

it's a gimmick feature with a lot of flaws.
don't look so deeply into it.
